lines.gurmukhi: jYsy PUl PUly qyqy Pl n lwgY dRum lwgq ijqyku prpk n skl hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Dhool Dhoolay Taytay Dhal N Laagai Drouma , Laagat Jitayku Parapak N Sakal Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All the flowers that blossom on a tree do not yield fruit. And whatever number of fruits appear, do not ripe to be eaten ultimately.

lines.gurmukhi: jyqy suq jnmq jIAq n rhY n qyqy jIAq hY jyqy qyqy kul n kml hYN
lines.transliteration_english: Jaytay Sout Janamat Jeeat N Rahai N Taytay , Jeeat Hai Jaytay Taytay Kul N Kamal Hain ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All sons born do not survive to live but all those who live do not bring name and fame to their family.

lines.gurmukhi: dl iml jwq jyqy suBt n hoie qyqy jyqk suBt jUJ mrq n Ql hYN
lines.transliteration_english: Dal Mil Jaat Jaytay Soubhat N Hoi Taytay , Jaytak Soubhat Joojh Marat N Dal Hain ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All those who join the army are not valiant soldiers. And those who are brave warriors do not die fighting in the battlefield.

lines.gurmukhi: AwrsI jugiq gur isK sB hI khwvY pwvk pRgws Bey ivrly Ac`l hYN ]368]
lines.transliteration_english: Aarasee Jougati Gur Sikh Sabh Hee Kahaavai , Paavak Pragaas Bhaay Viralay Achal Hain ?368?

Shabad OS B.translation: A glass embedded in a finger ring cracks when brought near fire but a genuine stone is unaffected. Similarly like a genuine stone, everyone is known as a Sikh but a few emerge genuine when put through traits. (368)
